snippet: A major Navy base ground to a halt for more than two hours Thursday after a sailor waved a weapon from a sixth-floor barracks room that turned out to be a pellet gun used for recreational purposes, officials said....

headline.print_headline: Pellet Gun Firing Causes Navy Base Lockdown
headline.main: Pellet Gun Firing Causes Navy Base Lockdown

lead_paragraph: A major Navy base ground to a halt for more than two hours Thursday after a sailor waved a weapon from a sixth-floor barracks room that turned out to be a pellet gun used for recreational purposes, officials said.
